thread.title: Alfonso

author: Alfonso
title: Alfonso
text:
Last few weeks i was lookung for a specific products, I got most of them but 2 of them i couldnÂ´t find them, so the representative of CarId helped my to find it, not only gave me the information, she gave me the specific links for every prodcut I was looking for and informed my the specific cost of the shipping, she took his time to supported my fast and nicely.
for sure i recommed the service of CarId.
Kind Regards
Alfonso
